data.title: Tesla: Solar Is On The Rise
data.text: Tesla has been working to refine the product offering that they have, getting ready for volume production; the ramp will truly begin later this year and conclude in 2022.

data.title: Tesla's (TSLA) Rally Could Be An Opportunity
data.text: The market for electric vehicles is proven, and Tesla not only is the market leader, but it produces the highest-quality vehicles.

data.title: Tesla owners in California receive warnings to recharge amid blackouts
data.text: When Wendy Bedolla got into her Tesla Model 3 Thursday morning there was a message waiting for her.

data.title: Tesla (TSLA) Witnesses Record Model 3 Delivery in the UK
data.text: Rising delivery of Tesla's (TSLA) Model 3 vehicles is aiding top-line growth.

data.title: Will Trade War and Controversies Thwart Tesla's Growth?
data.text: Tesla is dominating the electronic vehicle market for long but the trade war and frequent controversies have distracted it from its sky-high goals.

data.title: Tesla Rolls Over Own Feet With Pointless Smart Summon Release
data.text: Tesla released "smart summon" to show off new self-driving abilities, and while it mostly works, it's not very useful, and it fails enough that rather than improve their reputation, they seem to have hurt it.
